TopicTitle: Delta V readouts in VAB are not calculated for any stage that is above the stage containing the assembly anchor in the staging stack

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.2.0 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 11 64x | CPU: 13th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i9-13900HX Base speed: 2.20 GHz Sockets: 1 Cores: 24 Logical p | GPU: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4090 Laptop GPU Driver version: 31.0.15.3742 Driver date: 12/09/2023 | RAM: 32.0 GB Speed: 4800 MHz Slots used: 1 of 2 Form factor: SODIMM Hardware reserved: 265

 

Delta V readouts in VAB drop to zero in sections when adding a decoupler anywhere within the stack (im not placing it after the engine but before the tanks i mean on top of the section of tanks or in the middle it drops it to zero)

 

Edited December 22, 2023 by The Space Peacock
this happens when the stage containing the assembly anchor is below another stage. changed the title to that

This behavior can rear its ugly head in situation where you're docking to another craft, refueling and undocking, the game thinks you're out of fuel. And being out of fuel also causes you to not be able to create maneuver nodes.

.

Edited December 29, 2023 by Matrix Aran
Wrong thread.
